## caching-node package

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addClient](./caching-node.addclient.md) | A function that adds a client to the connected redis connection and manages permissions for assigned namespace |
|  [cleanup](./caching-node.cleanup.md) |  |
|  [closeConnection](./caching-node.closeconnection.md) |  |
|  [getArray](./caching-node.getarray.md) | A function that returns the value of a key from the namespace of the client, if not found, then generate a value from the passed callback, save it to redis and return it |
|  [getBool](./caching-node.getbool.md) | A function that returns the value of a key from the namespace of the client, if not found, then generate a value from the passed callback, save it to redis and return it |
|  [getNumber](./caching-node.getnumber.md) | A function that returns the value of a key from the namespace of the client, if not found, then generate a value from the passed callback, save it to redis and return it |
|  [getObject](./caching-node.getobject.md) | A function that returns the value of a key from the namespace of the client, if not found, then generate a value from the passed callback, save it to redis and return it |
|  [getString](./caching-node.getstring.md) | A function that returns the value of a key from the namespace of the client, if not found, then generate a value from the passed callback, save it to redis and return it |
|  [init](./caching-node.init.md) |  |
|  [put](./caching-node.put.md) | A function that adds a key value pair to the passed client's namespace |
|  [remove](./caching-node.remove.md) | Function that deletes all keys that match a specific pattern and its value from the namespace of the client on the redis server |
